title: Halsey and Evan Peters go public with romance at Halloween party
text:
Halsey and Evan are official (Picture: Rex, Getty Images)

Halsey and Evan Peters have finally confirmed their romance after weeks of speculation by going public at a Halloween party this weekend.

The new couple got into the spirit of the spooky holiday by dressing up as Sonny and Cher at the American Horror Story 100th Episode Celebration on Saturday night, held at Hollywood Forever in California.

It’s the first time the pair have been pictured together on the red carpet and it’s clear they’re totally in sync with each other. The couple were all kinds of matching with Halsey in a multi-coloured polka dot asymmetrical dress, while Evan rocked a similar shirt with a white suit jacket and trousers.

While Halsey wore Cher’s signature bold eye make-up, her new beau transformed his look with a Sonny-esque wig and moustache.

Halsey, 24, and Evan, 32, were first romantically linked in September when they were spotted holding hands at Six Flags Magic Mountain theme park.

An eyewitness told DailyMailTV that the pair seemed smitten and couldn’t keep their hands off each other.

‘They were laughing and flirting the whole time while we waited for the ride, it looked really romantic,’ the source said.

Halsey looks smitten (Picture: Rex Features)

The couple were first spotted holding hands in September (Picture: Getty Images)

Halsey and Evan were spotted holding hands on Friday (Picture: Backgrid)

‘It looked like they were having a fun date night before the Emmys. We were so surprised, because we didn’t even know that they knew each other.’

The insider continued: ‘They were smiling and laughing together and looking into each other’s eyes as they were waiting for the ride to start.

‘When we got off the roller coaster, we bought the photo of them on the ride and saw that they were holding hands, their fingers were intertwined.’

The night before attending the American Horror Story party this weekend, Halsey and Evan were seen wearing face paint for Halloween and holding hands.

Halsey was most recently thought to have dated fellow singer Yungblud but they have not been pictured together in months.

Evan was famously in a longtime relationship with his AHS co-star Emma Roberts for seven years, but they split in March and she is now dating actor Garrett Hedlund.
